recent_activity.description: Added two new conditions to your health record

medications.name: Alfuzosin
medications.instructions: Take 1 tablet before bed and avoid drinking alcohol for 2 hours after

medications.name: Dexamethasone
medications.instructions: Take 3 tablets, 3 times a day for 7 days

conditions.name: Sinusitis
conditions.description: A condition in which the cavities around the nasal passages become inflamed

notifications.title: New COVID-19 update for patients
notifications.message: All patients that have not received their COVID-19 will need to ensure they stay isolated for a minimum of 14 days.

messages.snippet: Just wanted to check in and see how you are feeling after our last appointment...

messages.snippet: We are excited to have you on board. Explore your health information securely...
